Author: NenPractitioner
Text: I have three potential raisins behind my disordered thoughts: societal pressure, coping method, and gendery reasons.

Author: yyyyy622
Text: I don't believe "diet culture" or society is actually the reason for most people developing an eating disorder. Its a lot about wanting to control our life, having certain perfectionist mindset etc.  These societal ideals might make it worse but they aren't the trigger. Also, with rising obesity levels, I think a lot of people would benefit from dieting.
